mapper.insert: insert into tbl_QnA (qna_no, user_id, qna_type, qna_sort_cd, title, content, save_time, input_name, input_tel, input_email, is_email_receive) values (#{qna_no}, #{user_id}, #{qna_type}, #{qna_sort_cd}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{input_name}, #{input_tel}, #{input_email}, #{is_email_receive})
mapper.update: update tbl_QnA set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_time = sysdate where qna_no = #{qna_no}
update tbl_QnA set is_del = 'Y', delete_time = sysdate where qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.select: select qna_no, title, to_char(save_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as save_time, case nvl(to_char(a_no), '0') when '0' then '답변미완료' else '답변완료' end as "a_state" from tbl_QnA where user_id = #{userID} and is_del = 'N' order by save_time desc

select q.qna_no, c.user_id, c.user_name, d.user_nick, c.user_tel, c.user_email, q.qna_sort_cd, b.qna_type_nm, q.title, q.content, to_char(nvl(q.update_time, q.save_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as q_save_time, case nvl(to_char(q.a_no), '0') when '0' then '답변미완료' else '답변완료' end as "a_state", q.a_no, a.title as a_title, a.content as a_content, e.m_nik, to_char(a.save_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as a_save_time from tbl_qna q left join tbl_QnASort b on q.qna_sort_cd = b.qna_sort_cd left join tbl_memberinfo c on q.user_id = c.user_id left join tbl_memberdetail d on q.user_id = d.user_id left join tbl_QnA a on q.a_no = a.qna_no left join tbl_manager_member e on a.user_id = e.user_id where q.qna_no= #{qna_no}
